ComicInfo.Summary: A flashback to the life of Boomboy, who spent several years locked in a basement. His only source of mental stimulation was the novel 'Huckleberry Finn', which contributes to his current delusions that most of his life is like the book.
ComicInfo.Title: We Don't Need No Education
